name: BRAWL BLAST
description:
An unofficial RPG game based on 'Brawl Stars' game characters!

Save the world by a terrible threat as Colt, Barley, or other 8 characters that you can unlock by advancing the game.

Defeat enemies, unlock new zones, and save the world. Respect these three rules and you're a cool Brawler!

Defeat waves and bosses with up to 5 actions.

Yeah that's right, every turn you can choose an action between five to deal damage, heal yourself, or protect, and those actions changes between Brawlers! But stay in alert on how you use your actions, because they cost Power Points, which are your energy, and if they are equal to zero, it's game over!

See little stories to understand better some stuff.

In some levels there are comics which help you understand better some moments, and entertain you a little bit.

Think smart, win smart

Through the game you can unlock up to 5 accessories, which help you winning easily. Those accessories protect you, make you stronger, or even save Power Points!

Also, some bosses have weaknesses that lead you to victory!

Level up your Brawlers by winning!

Your Brawlers can level up once they reach a certain amount of XP.  When they level up, their HP and strength increase. Their XP can increase if they win a battle.

Gene has opened a store?!

How can someone like Gene open a store? Well, it looks like it's possible! Beside him muttering, you can buy weird chests, XP for Brawlers, and Power Points with coins, obtainable from battles. Inside weird chests you can find coins, XP, Power Points, 2 Brawlers and a Store Key, a special key that you can convert into an INSANE amount of stuff!

What are you waiting for? Download it for free!

BKR Team likes money, but prefer their games to be open to everyone! Do not hesitate, download it now!
